channel.title: Help - Npc - Gets fked
channel.description:
[code]spawn = 1648 3409 3533 0 0 0 0 1 Crawling hand1 spawn = 1648 3409 3538 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand2 spawn = 1648 3407 3536 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand3 spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand4 spawn = 1648 3412 3535 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand5 spawn = 1648 3413 3539 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand6 spawn = 1648 3411 3542 0 0 0 0 1 crawling hand7 spawn = 1612 3410 3550 0 0 0 0 1 banshee1 spawn = 1612 3409 3547 0 0 0 0 1 banshee2 spawn = 1612 3413 3549 0 0 0 0 1 banshee3 spawn = 1612 3413 3546 0 0 0 0 1 banshee4 spawn = 1612 3416 3551 0 0 0 0 1 banshee5 spawn = 1612 3415 3547 0 0 0 0 1 banshee6 spawn = 1612 3414 3545 0 0 0 0 1 banshee7 spawn = 1633 3421 3548 0 0 0 0 1 pyre1 spawn = 1633 3423 3547 0 0 0 0 1 pyre2 spawn = 1633 3420 3545 0 0 0 0 1 pyre3 spawn = 1633 3422 3544 0 0 0 0 1 pyre4 spawn = 1633 3420 3543 0 0 0 0 1 pyre5 spawn = 1633 3423 3543 0 0 0 0 1 pyre6 spawn = 1633 3418 3545 0 0 0 0 1 pyre7 spawn = 1616 3427 3543 0 0 0 0 1 basi1 spawn = 1616 3430 3543 0 0 0 0 1 basi2 spawn = 1616 3433 3543 0 0 0 0 1 basi3 spawn = 1616 3428 3547 0 0 0 0 1 basi4 spawn = 1616 3426 3549 0 0 0 0 1 basi5 spawn = 1616 3428 3552 0 0 0 0 1 basi6 spawn = 1616 3429 3550 0 0 0 0 1 basi7 spawn = 1643 3423 3556 0 0 0 0 1 mage1 spawn = 1643 3422 3559 0 0 0 0 1 mage2 spawn = 1643 3420 3557 0 0 0 0 1 mage3 spawn = 1643 3418 3559 0 0 0 0 1 mage4 spawn = 1643 3416 3557 0 0 0 0 1 mage5 spawn = 1643 3414 3559 0 0 0 0 1 mage6 spawn = 1643 3414 3557 0 0 0 0 1 mage7 spawn = 1643 3411 3555 0 0 0 0 1 mage8 [/code]
That i tried to add. And i had alot to go but i thought id se if it works first. And when i log on to the server, i get black screened and then the lost connection thing. And then i cant logon again. This is really pissing me off just like this :mad: :mad: :mad: so i really need someone to help me and tell me why this is happening. Thanks!
In autospawn.cfg btw.

item.title: Help - Npc - Gets fked
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So it cant be like Fishing (space) Spot4 ? and i dont even have a space in those names at the auto-npcs i added :S[br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2007, 07:09:25 PM[/size][hr]I figured it out. If anyone else ever needs to know:

If you get that error you have one 0 less than you should have should have added 1 more on each one of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Npc - Gets fked
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

It’s supposed to be spawn[space]=[space]id[tab]'s from there

You need to remove any spaces after the one before id…

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Npc - Gets fked
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well it has alot of spaces… Everywhere where it says “spawn (space) = (space) ID (TAB)” and so on. If thats right.

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Npc - Gets fked
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Just go into your autospawn and replace all your spaces that shouldn’t be there.

You’r right. It isnt that code. I dont know which one tho of course

at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48)

        at NPCHandler.loadAutospawn(NPCHandler.java:1330)

        at server.main(server.java:27)

I have no clue
